channel.title: Ridiculous-PK ll Vps ll Official Post ll 718
channel.description:
[center]Hello fellow people i thought before we get started with images and information i'd tell you who we are and why we have opened!!
Hello if you have been bothered too read this somewhere in this post is a code tell the owner the code and claim some goods. We are ridiculous-PK we started in 2013 we aimed to have a high quality server and many players which didn't happen as we had some undeveloped kids trying to tell me how to code i listened and it got messed up yeah you lot i know bad idea.
I never intended to make money from this server i made it for a Non-Profitable organization. Which is the best way to succeed in a server but sadly the server went under construction and i never had time to revive it.
So now i bring you ridiculous-PK! at last after 7 Months of down time its backup please enjoy and read along.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jMHj0Bc.png[/img]
Forums: http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk/forums/ Webclient: http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk/webclient.html More pictures: http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk/forums/viewtopic.php?f=20&t=3 Donate: http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk/donate.html Website: http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk
latest update: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0p0f1NQ.png[/img]
New bosses
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yQ6OdcE.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WfsJ74ujaT4
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e9uO7vcE898
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WUto6GU.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZLhtX6V.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1JnwfX7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WUto6GU.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bzg7M4X.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4MaEjZS.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/onHaWUN.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9BtN0Ye.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rfX8Hrq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dA4FYfx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IPPXmE4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1JnwfX7.png[/img]
Why should you join Ridiculous-PK? Daily/Weekly updates. Decent drop rates, also double drops weekend. Good XP rates for skilling and combat. Awesome donator zone for our donators. Very good staff. Always someone online playing. Owner have owned many more popular servers. 0% Lagg.
Features:
Dungeoneering Dominion Tower Squeal of Fortune Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Recipe for Diaster Boss fight (Instanced map just like runescape) Glacors with fire spell weekness. Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. Loyalty Shop Kuradals Dungeon Queen Black Dragon Barrows Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Godwars (Zaros, Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ol5YWMi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lT3Nwau.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eoJadEF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ep8ZRth.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MzhGQaH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EZ32OvS.png[/img][/center]
